wdi2-SH.UHC.OOPC.25.TO.def: Catastrophic Health Expenditure, 25% of total expenditure/income (thousands)
wdi2-SH.UHC.OOPC.25.TO.name: Number of people spending more than 25% of household consumption or income on out-of-pocket health care expenditure
wdi2-SH.UHC.OOPC.25.TO.source: World Health Organization and World Bank. 2019. Global Monitoring Report on Financial Protection in Health 2019.
